summary:
Hd retextures of misc stuff: Cast iron pots, lamp, clothes iron, and practicedummy

More to come!!!
descriptionHtml:
-------------------------------------
readme_hd_misc_v1.0.txt
creation date: 12/13/2011
-------------------------------------
PLEASE DO NOT DISTRIBUTE THE MOD EVER WITHOUT THIS README!
-------------------------------------


-------------------------------------
HELLO:
-------------------------------------
hi friends! :) this pack is a collection of my previous seperate mods. i made these mods to give something back to the great nexus community. my name is calav3ra, and you can get in contact with me by emailing to: jonnyhope AT gmx DOT net. my personal website is found under: www.calav3ras.de but it isn\'t related to skyrim at all.
Thanks for listening! Lets make Skyrim greater each day! :)

-------------------------------------
INSTALL:
-------------------------------------
Drag or copy the \"textures\" folder into your Skyrim\\Data folder!

-------------------------------------
CONTENT:
-------------------------------------
This package contains retextures of:

- lampgeneric01 (Lamp):
v1.0 - resized color-texture from 128x128 to 1024x1024
v1.1 - updated colors to match the original more
	 - added and resized normalmap-texture from 128x128 to 512x512 (dxt5)
	 - added mipmaps for less gpu-stress and less aliasing/flickering
	 
- iron01 (Clothes Iron):
v1.0 - resized color-texture from 128x256 to 256x512
v1.1 - improved color surface (more clean)
	 - added mipmaps for less gpu-stress and less aliasing/flickering
	 - added and resized normalmap-texture from 128x256 to 256x512 (dxt5)
	 	 
- practicedummy01 (Practice Dummy):
v1.0 - resized color-texture from to 2048x2048
v1.1 - reduced orange colorchange slightly to look a bit more like the original, but
	   still not as washed out/greyish.
	 - color-texture now slightly more sharp.
	 - added mipmaps for less gpu-stress and less aliasing/flickering

- castironpotmedium01 + castironpotsmall01 (Cast Iron Pots):
v1.0 - resized color-texture from 512x256 to 2048x1024
v1.1 - corrected colors to match originals, fixed seams
	 - added mipmaps for less gpu-stress and less aliasing/flickering
author: calav3ra
